biotools.summary: pyGOMoDo is a Python library to perform homology modeling and docking specifically designed for human GPCRs. pyGOMoDo is a python wrap-up of the updated functionalities of GOMoDo web-service (https://gomodo.grs.kfa-juelich.de). It was designed for convenient use with Jupyter notebooks.
